description.0: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

0.0: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>20%</cryo> of ATK for 5s.

1.0: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>25%</cryo> of ATK for 5s.

2.0: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>30%</cryo> of ATK for 5s.

3.0: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>35%</cryo> of ATK for 5s.

4.0: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>40%</cryo> of ATK for 5s.
